topic.title: YouTube removes hundreds of the best climate science videos from the Internet
topic.body:
Check out my blog post and petition to YouTube

http://climatestate.com/2017/02/03/youtube-removes-hundreds-of-the-best-climate-science-videos-from-the-internet/

1_17AcmbLffN1gjfsTf6Jy8K2aBPdMaSBrrf.body:
Can you post a link to ZeroTube, KopyKat and IPFSTube?

Just arrived here because YouTube removed 280 videos from my channel and look for a way to distribute climate related videos without censoring.

http://climatestate.com/2017/02/03/youtube-removes-hundreds-of-the-best-climate-science-videos-from-the-internet/
